definition: extinct (species)/extinction
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
seed/species/kind/type/classifier for types, kinds, sorts
to plant/to grow/to cultivate
genocide

sentences.english: No buts. You tin melodrama extinction afterward.
sentences.chinese: 別說可是，還輪不到你絕種呢。

sentences.english: But today, fox hunting itself is on the verge of becoming an endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，獵狐活動本身就快成爲瀕臨絕種的東西了。

sentences.english: Where? Wait a minute. I thought mammoths were extinct.
sentences.chinese: 在哪裏呢？等等。我以爲長毛象已經絕種了。

sentences.english: The South China Tiger (Panthera tigris amoyensis) is in grave danger of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 中國南方老虎於絕種的危殆。

sentences.english: Dogs and horses raised in captivity are way better to eat than endangered whales poached from the wild.
sentences.chinese: 喫圈養的狗和馬至少要比喫快絕種的鯨魚好。

sentences.english: Now the AFS (Allied Free Sentients ), the galaxy's last free sentient beings, are on the verge of extinction.
sentences.chinese: 現在，戰地服務團，銀河的最後衆生瀕臨絕種。

sentences.english: Certain extinct cephalopods have an unusual coiling shape.
sentences.chinese: 某些絕種的頭足類動物具有特殊的旋卷形態。

sentences.english: The Sulu elephants are thought to have originated in Java, where elephants are now extinct.
sentences.chinese: 蘇祿大象認爲均源自於爪哇，那裏的大象正瀕臨絕種。

sentences.english: But we also found an enormous number of critically endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們同時也發現了大量物種瀕臨絕種。

sentences.english: Killing endangered species is punishable by a 12-year prison term and stiff fines.
sentences.chinese: 殺害瀕臨絕種物種可處12年有期徒刑及高額罰款。

sentences.english: Many beautiful fish are fast disappearing because of the pollution.
sentences.chinese: 殷爲污染嚴重，秧多睦麗的魚類正在面臨絕種。

sentences.english: Preventing genocide is a collective and individual responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 防止滅絕種族罪是集體和個人的責任。

sentences.english: The moth's habitat is being destroyed and it has nearly died out.
sentences.chinese: 這種蛾子因棲息地正受到破壞，幾乎絕種了。

sentences.english: Black-faced spoonbills are an endangered species.
sentences.chinese: 黑面琵鷺是瀕臨絕種的品種。

sentences.english: Maybe mammoths are going extinct because they put themselves in danger too often.
sentences.chinese: 也許長毛象就是因爲它們太愛冒險而會絕種的。

sentences.english: The native chestnut is not extinct.
sentences.chinese: 土生的慄樹並沒有絕種。

definition: lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence/too far to be able to help
decline in fortunes
animals
to make a long story short (idiom)
unstable/erratic/changeable/fickle
to suffer defeat in every battle (idiom)
reptile/(Internet) web crawler
emotional state
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
affectionate/an affectionate person
man of Qǐ fears the sky falling (idiom); groundless fears
to be of no interest to anyone (idiom)
to listen with respectful attention/(a polite request to sb to speak)/we are all ears
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to force someone to do something
